Reading for writing style

Posted by The WI+RE Team on January 12, 2010

Stylistic rules and conventions vary greatly across the many unique fields of research.

Before you start writing your paper, find a few representative articles in your desired field to analyze. Ask yourself the following questions to make sure your own writing aligns with disciplinary conventions
